loginpage.title: Login
loginpage.intro: To access our website , please login with the username and password that was provided to you.

hero.weddingwebsite: This is an invite for you to make our wedding day magnificent.
hero.locationwedding: Sarajevo Golf Club, Bosnia and Herzegovina

location.title: Location
location.introduction: Some more information about the city where we are getting married, the location of the wedding and what to visit in Sarajevo if you are not a local.
location.cerimonia: Both the wedding ceremony and the reception will take place at Sarajevo golf club.
location.mapsuggestions: On the map below, we've outlined a few things that can be helpful in navigating the city if you are not local.

RSVP.title: R.S.V.P.
RSVP.headerExplain: Please complete the form below ASAP to let us know if you can make it to the wedding.
RSVP.thanks: Thanks for your RSVP. Please let us know if there are any changes at least two weeks before the wedding.
RSVP.fieldAllergies: Do you have any allergies or dietary preferences?

plusOne.guestAllergies: Does your guest have allergies or dietary preferences?
plusOne.title: Do you have a Plus-One?

contactus.title: Get in touch
contactus.summary: If you have questions or a special request, please contact us by email.
contactus.bridesummary: Born in Sarajevo, she spent part of her childhood in Italy. Always eager to meet new places, different people, cultures, smells and tastes. Big fan of animals, especially those in need. It strives to constantly provide opportunities for people to show their well-intentioned side. Grounded, modest, she finds beauty in the little things. After trying to study medicine, she continued and graduated from the Faculty of Economics in Sarajevo. She showed great taste by noticing her future husband on instagram and contacting him.
contactus.groomsummary: Born in Bijeljina and raised both in Sweden and Bijeljina. Experienced martial-art fighter and also competed in shoot-fighting, but works as an Software Engineer. Decided to study informatics at the late age of 28 at the Linnaeus university. Loves animals, sometimes even more than people acctualy. Has an american staffordshire terrier called Chilli who was acctually one of the reasons he met his future wife. Created an instagram account in 2014 whith mostly posts of Chilli, and thanks to that he got a DM that one special day.

menu.title: Menu
menu.paragraph: Stay tuned for unveiling of the menu.
